description:
Plan and execute your canoe trip to Massasauga Provincial Park with this thoughtfully designed map. Two-sided design lets you plot route options on the planning side of the map using whiteboard markers and a quick reference itinerary chart. The map even comes with route suggestions for different experience levels. Flip over to the trip side of the map to use colour-coded routes for navigation.

  • Includes Georgian Bay and Crown land
  • POIs rated with stars, makes it easy to know if you should detour to a lookout or continue on your way
  • Colour-coded routes and types of POIs
  • Remote areas highlighted
  • Portage steepness indicators help you plan
name: Unlostify Massasauga Map 1.2
